body: At 13th level, a martial artist may use the defensive roll advanced rogue talent once per day, plus once per three levels beyond 13th (to a maximum of 3 times a day at 19th level). This ability replaces diamond soul.
name: Defensive Roll
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Monk/Monk Archetypes/Martial Artist/Defensive Roll
